vector_data.text: Hotels Near Malpani Infertility Clinic: Happy Home Hotel (Rs 1400), Hotel Fortune, Hotel Manama. A 5 min walk away.
A complete IVF cycle at our clinic costs US $4000. This includes all medical procedures, lab tests, scans, egg pickup and embryo transfer.
Embryo freezing costs US $1000 per year. Laser assisted hatching costs US $500 more.
The clinic is located in Colaba, Mumbai. It is about 15 minutes by taxi from VT Station.
